scripts.dev:nohup: mkdir -p logs && nohup cargo watch -x run > logs/dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .cargo-watch.pid
scripts.debug:w: mkdir -p logs && RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -x 'run' 2>&1 | tee logs/debug.log
scripts.debug:nohup: mkdir -p logs && nohup sh -c 'RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -x run' > logs/debug-nohup.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .cargo-watch.pid
scripts.prod:nohup: mkdir -p logs && nohup cargo run --release > logs/production.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .cargo.pid
scripts.kill: pkill -f 'cargo watch' || pkill -f 'cargo run' || echo 'No cargo processes found'
scripts.kill:nohup: [ -f .cargo-watch.pid ] && kill $(cat .cargo-watch.pid) && rm .cargo-watch.pid || [ -f .cargo.pid ] && kill $(cat .cargo.pid) && rm .cargo.pid || echo 'No PID file found'
scripts.kill:all: pkill -f cargo || echo 'No cargo processes found'
scripts.kill:port: lsof -ti:8888 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process found on port 8888'
